sqlMap.select: /* schedule.lang.list */ SELECT SCHEDULE_ID, LANG_KND, NAME, PLACE, COMMENTS, INS_DATIM, UPD_DATIM FROM SCHEDULE_LANG WHERE SCHEDULE_ID=CAST(#scheduleId# AS INTEGER)
/* schedule.lang.detail */ SELECT SCHEDULE_ID, LANG_KND, NAME, PLACE, COMMENTS, INS_DATIM, UPD_DATIM FROM SCHEDULE_LANG WHERE SCHEDULE_ID=CAST(#scheduleId# AS INTEGER) LANG_KND=#langKnd#
sqlMap.update: /* schedule.lang.update */ UPDATE SCHEDULE_LANG SET NAME=#name#, PLACE=#place#, COMMENTS=#comments#, UPD_DATIM=GETDATE() WHERE SCHEDULE_ID=CAST(#scheduleId# AS INTEGER) LANG_KND=#langKnd#
sqlMap.delete: /* schedule.lang.delete */ DELETE FROM SCHEDULE_LANG WHERE SCHEDULE_ID=CAST(#scheduleId# AS INTEGER) LANG_KND=#langKnd#
